title: Final Game Awards Predictions - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.12.19
description:
For 10% off and free shipping, go to http://brooklinen.com and use promo code GAMES.

Get 20% off and free shipping with the code GAMES at http://manscaped.com.

Just go to http://getquip.com/games to save on gift sets and to get your first refill FREE with a refill plan.

Imran and Tim go over the latest Resident Evil news, Game Awards teases, Naughty Dog charities, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:05:02 - Housekeeping
Game Awards are TONIGHT. Watch-a-long with us! twitch.tv/kindafunnygames 
KINDA DC is doing a Best Friend Meet-Up December 14 at 5PM in Georgetown. Details on twitter.com/kindadc.
The Roper Report   -
00:07:47 - Looks like Resident Evil 2 will get a secret Resi 3-themed update
00:09:27 - REmake 2 Achievement Image Suggests MAJOR DLC
00:16:13 - Capcom really put a guy named Martin Sandwich in the new Resident Evil
00:19:18 - Bethesda updating Doom 1, 2 to include select mods like John Romero's Sigil
00:23:41 - Required Reading: https://bit.ly/2PAL6jA
00:24:30 - Naughty Dog donating Jak & Daxter proceeds to charity
00:31:09 - Out today
00:35:55 -  Brooklinen
00:37:36 - Quip
00:38:28 - Manscaped
00:39:57 - BREAKING NEWS  
 Reader mail   -
00:41:11 - “What do you expect to see get announced at Game Awards?” - The 5 Star Man
00:53:15 - “Do you think that this could be the worst year for video games of the 21st century so far?” - Greg from Edmonton
01:07:47 - “What are your fondest holiday memories?” - The Nano Biologist
01:09:41 - Squad Up: Vitz Patel - Twitter - @NerfAlice
01:10:22 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Imran & Snowbike MIKE
